attributes.action: Fund BBC to expand music diversity by introducing Radio 2 Extra radio station
attributes.additional_details: Improve air time to educate and understand diverse worldwide cultures through the medium of specialist music genres
attributes.background: Increase BBC programming of specialist music genres so as to reach a national audience during peak daytime listening hours

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the content of different radio stations are an operational matter for the BBC, not the UK Government or Parliament.
